      • checkCard

        public GameStat checkCard(Field grass,
                          int dice,
                          GameStat track,
                          LineupManager enemy)
        Verifies what result comes from a diceroll and updates the field and gametrack accordingly
        Parameters:
        grass - The status of the field that the game is being played on
        dice - The value of the diceroll being compared against the card
        track - The GameStat of the game currently being played
        enemy - The lineup of the team currently on the field
        Returns:
        The updated GameStat from the selected card result
